code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TextField,Button,Box,Paper}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTaskForm=_ref=>{let{onAddTask,isLoading}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(title.trim()&&description.trim()){onAddTask(title,description);setTitle('');setDescription('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{elevation:2,sx:{p:2,mb:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{component:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Task Title",variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Task Description",variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",multiline:true,rows:3,value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",disabled:isLoading,sx:{mt:2},children:isLoading?'Adding...':'Add Task'})]})});};export default AddTaskForm;
